tool.name: MetaboliteSpectralMatcher
tool.description: Find potential HMDB ids within the given mass error window.
tool.command:
MetaboliteSpectralMatcher
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_algorithm_prec_mass_error_value: -algorithm:prec_mass_error_value $param_algorithm_prec_mass_error_value #end if #if $param_algorithm_frag_mass_error_value: -algorithm:frag_mass_error_value $param_algorithm_frag_mass_error_value #end if #if $param_algorithm_mass_error_unit: -algorithm:mass_error_unit #end if #if $param_algorithm_report_mode: -algorithm:report_mode #end if #if $param_algorithm_ionization_mode: -algorithm:ionization_mode #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #end if

param.name: param_algorithm_prec_mass_error_value
param.label: Error allowed for precursor ion mass

param.name: param_algorithm_mass_error_unit
param.label: Unit of mass error (ppm or Da)

param.name: param_algorithm_report_mode
param.label: Which results shall be reported: the top-three scoring ones or the best scoring one?

tool.help:
Find potential HMDB ids within the given mass error window.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/UTILS_MetaboliteSpectralMatcher.html
